pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, November 10, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Italy, Giorgia Meloni.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

11:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
